1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Select elements.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.List.Select
6  ( -- * Type
7    Select, Select2,
8  
9    -- * Index
10    selectIndex, selectIndexFull, selectIndexBoth,
11  
12    -- * Selection
13    selectElems, selectOthers, selectBoth,
14
15    -- * Trisection
16    selectShare, selectLeft, selectRight,
17
18    -- * Permutaion
19    permuteForward, permuteBackward, 
20    permuteForward2, permuteBackward2,
21    permuteOrder,
22  ) where
23
24import qualified Data.List                           as List
25import qualified Data.Set                            as Set
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture            as O
27
28
29-- --------------------------------------------  Type
30
31-- | Select elements using indicies.
32type Select a = [Int] -> O.Map [a]
33
34-- | Selection for different types.
35type Select2 a b = (Select a, Select b)
36
37
38-- --------------------------------------------  Index
39
40-- | Indices of shared elements.
41--
42--   >>> selectIndex "bdk" "abcdefg"
43--   [1,3]
44--
45selectIndex :: (Eq a) => [a] -> [a] -> [Int]
46selectIndex ks xs = filter (>= 0) $ selectIndexFull ks xs
47
48-- | Indicies of shared-and-unknown elements.
49--
50--   >>> selectIndexFull "bcx" "abcdefg"
51--   [1,2,-1]
52--
53selectIndexFull :: (Eq a) => [a] -> [a] -> [Int]
54selectIndexFull ks xs = map ind ks where
55    ind k = maybe (-1) id $ List.elemIndex k xs
56
57-- | Left-and-right indices of shared elements.
58--
59--   >>> selectIndexBoth "abc" "bcd"
60--   ([1,2], [0,1])
61--
62selectIndexBoth :: (Ord a) => [a] -> [a] -> ([Int], [Int])
63selectIndexBoth xs1 xs2 =
64    let sh = selectShare xs1 xs2
65    in (selectIndex sh xs1, selectIndex sh xs2)
66
67
68-- --------------------------------------------  Selection
69
70-- | Pick up indexed elements.
71--
72--   >>> [1,3] `selectElems` "abcdefg"
73--   "bd"
74--
75--   >>> [1,3] `selectElems` "ABCDEFG"
76--   "BD"
77--
78selectElems :: Select a
79selectElems ps xs = loop ps xs 0 where
80    loop pps@(p:ps2) (x:xs2) i =
81        case compare p i of
82          EQ             -> x : loop ps2 xs2 (i + 1)
83          GT             ->     loop pps xs2 (i + 1)
84          LT | p >= 0    -> selectElems pps xs  -- restart
85             | otherwise -> selectElems ps2 xs  -- ignore minus index
86    loop pps@(p:ps2) [] i
87        | p < i     = selectElems pps xs  -- restart
88        | otherwise = selectElems ps2 xs  -- ignore large index
89    loop [] _ _ = []
90
91-- Simple implementation
92-- selectElems :: [Int] -> Map [a]
93-- selectElems ps xs = map (xs !!) ps
94
95-- | Cut off indexed elements.
96--
97--   >>> selectIndex "ce" "abcdefg" `selectOthers` "ABCDEFG"
98--   "ABDFG"
99--
100selectOthers :: Select a
101selectOthers ps xs = loop 0 xs where
102    loop _ [] = []
103    loop p (x:xs2)
104        | p `elem` ps  =     loop (p + 1) xs2
105        | otherwise    = x : loop (p + 1) xs2
106
107-- | Pair of picking-up and cutting-off elements.
108--
109--   >>> selectIndex "ce" "abcdefg" `selectBoth` "ABCDEFG"
110--   ("CE", "ABDFG")
111--
112selectBoth :: [Int] -> [a] -> ([a], [a])
113selectBoth ps xs = (selectElems ps xs, selectOthers ps xs)
114
115
116-- --------------------------------------------  Trisection
117
118-- | Take shared elements.
119--
120--   >>> "abcd" `selectShare` "cbefg"
121--   "bc"
122--
123selectShare :: (Ord a) => O.Bin [a]
124selectShare = flip selectShareRight
125
126selectShareRight :: (Ord a) => O.Bin [a]
127selectShareRight xs = filter (`Set.member` Set.fromList xs)
128
129-- | Take left-side elements.
130--
131--   >>> "abcd" `selectLeft` "bcefg"
132--   "ad"
133--
134selectLeft :: (Ord a) => O.Bin [a]
135selectLeft = flip selectRight
136
137-- | Take right-side elements.
138--
139--   >>> "abcd" `selectRight` "bcefg"
140--   "efg"
141--
142selectRight :: (Ord a) => O.Bin [a]
143selectRight xs = filter (`Set.notMember` Set.fromList xs)
144
145
146-- --------------------------------------------  Permutation
147
148-- | Move indexed elements to the front.
149--
150--   >>> selectIndex "cd" "abcdefg" `permuteForward` "ABCDEFG"
151--   "CDABEFG"
152--
153permuteForward :: Select a
154permuteForward ps xs = case selectBoth ps xs of
155                         (select, others) -> select ++ others
156
157-- | Move indexed elements to the rear.
158--
159--   >>> selectIndex "cd" "abcdefg" `permuteBackward` "ABCDEFG"
160--   "ABEFGCD"
161--
162permuteBackward :: Select a
163permuteBackward ps xs = case selectBoth ps xs of
164                          (select, others) -> others ++ select
165
166-- | Double forward.
167permuteForward2 :: Select2 a b
168permuteForward2 = (permuteForward, permuteForward)
169
170-- | Double backward.
171permuteBackward2 :: Select2 a b
172permuteBackward2 = (permuteBackward, permuteBackward)
173
174-- | Reorder elements.
175--
176--   >>> permuteOrder "bca" "abc" "ABC"
177--   "BCA"
178--
179permuteOrder :: (Eq a) => [a] -> [a] -> O.Map [c]
180permuteOrder to from
181    | to == from = id
182    | otherwise  = selectElems $ selectIndex to from
